complex.title: Bar Chart Tour
complex.text: We will show you an interactive bar chart. But before that, let's walk you through the main components of the visualization.

complex.title: Bar Chart Visualization
complex.text:
This is the interactive bar chart. You can adjust the filter for the data and the changes will show up here.
Your turn: Hover over a bar to see details about that bar.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text:
The x-axis shows time in weeks. You can use this filter to select a subset of weeks. Only the data of the selected weeks will be shown in the visualization.
Note: When you select a filter, each bar will be broken down by age group for both vaccinated and unvaccinated people.

Your turn: To proceed to the next step, create a filter by clicking and dragging over a set of weeks.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text: Your turn: Move the filter you have created.

complex.title: This is a time filter!
complex.text: Your turn: Click on the time filter outside of the selection area (or press the 'Esc' key) to clear the filter.

complex.title: This is the legend.
complex.text:
Note that this legend will change when interacting with the filter.

That"s it, have fun exploring the data!

moderate.title: Bar Chart Tour
moderate.text: We will show you a stacked bar chart. But before that, let's walk you through the main components of the visualization.

moderate.title: Bar Chart Visualization
moderate.text:
This is the stacked bar chart.
Your turn: Hover over a bar to see details about that bar.

moderate.title: This is the legend.
moderate.text:
The rate of unvaccinated people is presented in orange, and the rate of vaccinated people is presented in blue.

That"s it, have fun exploring the data!
